text: @DavidBrodyCBN @realDonaldTrump I'm not a part of the 'liberal media', but I am definitely a #RepublicansAgainstTrump. If you're excited about 10,000 (or the real 6200) with a group that doesn't believe in the #covid19 pandemic by the lack of masks worn, then you are kidding yourself. This ship is sinking. https://t.co/5dL9MbY2WC
